skill_e.tooltip: Passive:  Aatrox  heals for the portion of the damage he deals to  champions.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Periodically,  Aatrox's next basic attack deals bonus  physical damage and  heals him, based on the target's maximum health.

skill_q.tooltip: Active:  Aatrox slams his greatsword down up to 3 times before it goes on cooldown, with each having an unique area of effect and dealing physical damage. The damage is increased if enemies are hit by a telegraphed Sweetspot within the area.

skill_r.tooltip: Active:  Aatrox unleashes his true demonic form,  fearing nearby enemy  minions and gaining  decaying bonus movement speed.

skill_w.tooltip: Active:  Aatrox smashes the ground, creating a chain that stops on the first enemy hit, dealing physical damage.  Champions and  large monsters have to leave the impact area quickly or they will be  pulled back to the center and take the damage again.

skill_e.tooltip: Active:  Ahri blows a kiss that deals  magic damage and  charms an enemy it encounters, instantly  stopping movement abilities and causing them to walk harmlessly towards her. Additionally, the target temporarily takes increased damage from her.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Whenever  Ahri lands 2 ability hits on  champions within a short period, she briefly gains  bonus movement speed.

skill_q.tooltip: Passive:  Ahri's ability hits build up  Essence Theft stacks up to a cap.

skill_r.tooltip: Active:  Ahri  dashes forward and fires essence bolts, dealing  magic damage to nearby enemies. The ability can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown.

skill_w.tooltip: Active:  Ahri releases three fox-fires, that lock onto nearby enemies, dealing  magic damage to them. They prioritize her main target.

skill_e.tooltip: Active:  Akali  dashes backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing  magic damage. The first enemy or  smoke cloud hit is marked. Re-cast to  dash to the marked target, dealing damage again.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Dealing damage with her abilities to a  champion creates a ring of energy around them. Exiting that ring empowers  Akali's next basic attack with  bonus range and  magic damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Active:  Akali throws out five kunai, dealing  magic damage based on her  attack damage and  ability power, and  slowing targets hit at the maximum range.

skill_r.tooltip: Active:  Akali  dashes over a target enemy  champion, damaging all enemies she strikes with  physical damage. She may then recast the ability to  dash in a direction, executing all enemies she strikes with  magic damage.

skill_w.tooltip: Active:  Akali drops a cover of smoke and briefly gains  bonus movement speed. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes  invisible. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her.

skill_e.tooltip: Active:  Alistar tramples nearby enemy units,  ignoring unit collision and gaining stacks if he deals  magic damage to enemy  champion with Trample. At full stacks his next basic attack against an enemy  champion deals additional  magic damage and  stuns them.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate:  Alistar charging up his roar by  stunning or  displacing enemy  champions or when nearby enemies die. He roars when charged up,  healing himself and all nearby allied  champions.

skill_q.tooltip: Active:  Alistar smashes the ground, dealing  magic damage to nearby enemies and  knocking them up into the air.

skill_r.tooltip: Active:  Alistar lets out a wild roar,  cleanses all crowd control effects from himself, and gains damage reduction for a duration.

skill_w.tooltip: Active:  Alistar rams a target with his head, dealing  magic damage and  knocking them back.

skill_e.tooltip: Passive: Permanently reduces the physical damage  Amumu would take.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate:  Amumu's basic attacks Curse his enemies, causing them to take bonus  true damage from incoming  magic damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Active:  Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target,  stunning and dealing  magic damage to the target while he  dashes to them.

skill_r.tooltip: Active:  Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages,  stopping their movements, applying his Curse, dealing  magic damage to them,  rooting and  disarming them.

skill_w.tooltip: Toggle:  Amumu, overcome by anguish, cries and nearby enemies lose a percentage of their  maximum health each second as  magic damage and have their Curse refreshed.

string_expression: 5 + 0.5% (+ 0.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
7.5 + 0.625% (+ 0.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
10 + 0.75% (+ 0.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
12.5 + 0.875% (+ 0.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
15 + 1% (+ 0.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health

skill_e.tooltip: Active: With a flap of her wings,  Anivia blasts a freezing gust of wind at her target, dealing some  magic damage. If the target is chilled, the damage they take is doubled.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Upon dying,  Anivia will revert into an egg. If the egg can survive for six seconds, she is gloriously reborn.

skill_q.tooltip: Active:  Anivia brings her wings together and summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling,  slowing and dealing  magic damage to anyone in its path. When the sphere explodes it does the same damage in a radius,  stunning anyone in the area.

skill_r.tooltip: Toggle:  Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail to deal  magic damage to her enemies and  slow them. The fully formed storm also chills them.

skill_w.tooltip: Active:  Anivia condenses the moisture in the air into an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The wall only lasts a short duration before it melts.

skill_e.tooltip: Active: Grants  Annie and  Tibbers damage reduction and deals magic damage to enemies who attack them with   basic attacks.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate After casting 4 spells,  Annie's next offensive spell will  stun the target for a short duration.

skill_q.tooltip: Active:  Annie hurls a fireball, dealing  magic damage and refunding its  mana cost if it kills her target.

skill_r.tooltip: Active:  Annie summons her bear  Tibbers, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area.  Tibbers deals magic damage with attacks and also burn nearby enemies.

skill_w.tooltip: Active:  Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing magic damage to all enemies in the area.

skill_e.tooltip: The icon of this ability reflects the next weapon that is the next in the queue.

skill_i.tooltip:
Innate: Aphelios wields 5 Lunari Weapons made by his sister Alune. He has access to two at a time: main weapon and off-hand weapon. Each weapon has a unique basic attack and active ability.

Innate - Precision: Aphelios has bonus range while Calibrum is his main weapon. Abilities will mark targets, and he may attack them from far away with the current off-hand weapon, consuming the mark and dealing bonus physical damage.

Innate - Resurgent: Aphelios' basic attacks will heal him. Additionally, create a shield from excess healing.

Innate - Binding: Aphelios's basic attacks apply a decaying slow on his targets on-hit.

Innate - Incendiary: Aphelios' basic attacks will hit everyone, then spreads in a cone behind his main target.

Innate - Arcing: Aphelios throws a chakram as his basic attack. He can't attack until it came back to him. Other abilities will create mirror chakrams that he accumulates, and uses them to empower his damage.

skill_q.tooltip:
The active effect of Aphelios' varies based on his current main weapon. Calibrum - Moonshot: Long range shot that marks its target for a long-range follow-up attack. Severum - Onslaught: Gain bonus movement speed while attacking a single enemy with both weapons. Gravitum - Binding Eclipse: Root all enemies who are * slowed by this weapon. Infernum - Duskwave: Blast enemies in a cone and attack them with your off-hand weapon. Crescendum - Sentry: Deploy a sentry that shoots your off-hand weapon.

Active: Aphelios fires a bolt of energy in a line, dealing physical damage and marks the first enemy hit.

Active: Aphelios gains bonus movement speed and quickly attacks a target with Severum and his current off-hand weapon dealing physical damage to them.

Active: Aphelios deals magic damage and roots all targets that are slowed by Gravitum.

Active: Aphelios unleases a wave of energy in a cone, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit and locking on to each of them. After a delay he basic attack all locked targets.

Active: Aphelios deploys lunar sentry that uses his off-hand weapon. It attacks nearby enemies dealing physical damage.

skill_r.tooltip:
Active:  Aphelios fires a concentrated blast of moonlight that explodes on enemy  champions dealing physical damage. Then  basic attacks raining from the sky to them, dealing physical damage and applying unique effects of his main weapon.
 Calibrum: Applies an empowered mark on all target.
 Severum: The initial blast  heals him, and so does the attacks.
 Gravitum: An empowered  slow applied on all target.
 Infernum: The initial blast deals increased damage, and the attacks splashes on each target.
 Crescendum:  Aphelios gains more mirror chakrams the more target he hit with the initial blast.

skill_w.tooltip: Active: Aphelios switches between his main weapon and off-hand weapon.

skill_e.tooltip: Active:  Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map. The spirit  exposes the area along its path and a large area at its destination.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate  Ashe's attacks  slow their target, causing her  basic attacks to deal increased damage to these targets.

skill_q.tooltip: Passive:  Ashe builds up Focus by  basic attacking enemies.

skill_r.tooltip: Active:  Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy  champion, it deals magic damage and  stuns them what last longer the farther the arrow has traveled. In addition, surrounding enemy units take magic damage and are  slowed.

skill_w.tooltip: Active:  Ashe fires 9 arrows in a cone dealing physical damage to enemies. It also applies Critical Slow's  slow.

skill_e.tooltip: Active:  Aurelion Sol takes off flying for a long distance.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Stars orbit  Aurelion Sol, dealing magic damage when they hit an enemy. Additionally, beyond them exists an Outer Limit affecting his other abilities.

skill_q.tooltip: Active:  Aurelion Sol creates an expanding disk, which explodes to  stun and deal magic damage to enemies when it reaches the Outer Limit.

skill_r.tooltip: Active:  Aurelion Sol projects a blast of pure star fire, dealing magic damage and  slowing all enemies caught in it. Close enemies are also  knocked back to the Outer Limit.

skill_w.tooltip: Passive: The star's base damage passively increased.

skill_e.tooltip: Active:  Azir  shields himself briefly and  dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, dealing magic damage to enemies. If he hits an enemy  champion, he instantly readies a new Sand Soldiers for deployment and halts his  dash.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate:  Azir periodically can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of allied or enemy  turrets.

skill_q.tooltip: Active:  Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. They deal magic damage and  slow enemies they pass through.

skill_r.tooltip: Active:  Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward,  knocking back and deals magic damage to enemies. They will stand as a wall for a short time after charge.

skill_w.tooltip: Passive:  Azir periodically stocks a Sand Soldier up to a cap. Additionally, if three of them are summoned,  Azir gains  bonus attack speed.

skill_e.tooltip: Active:  Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Ally and enemy  champions alike can take a one-way trip through that terrain by moving into the portal, however allies will be faster.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate - Ancient Chimes:  Bard's presence causes magical chimes to appear, which grant him  experience,  mana, and burst of  movement speed.

skill_q.tooltip: Active:  Bard fires a missile which will  slow the first enemy struck, and continue onward. If it strikes a wall, it will  stun the initial target; if it strikes another enemy, it will  stun them both.

skill_r.tooltip: Active: Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all  champions,  minions,  monsters, and  turrets hit into  stasis for a brief time.

skill_w.tooltip: Active: conjures a healing shrine which powers up over a short time, disappearing after  healing the first ally  champion that touches it.

skill_e.tooltip: Active:  Blitzcrank charges up a fist to make the next  basic attack deal double damage and  knock up the target into the air.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: When  Blitzcrank gets low on  health, Mana Barrier generates a  shield that scales with  maximum mana.

skill_q.tooltip: Active:  Blitzcrank fires the right hand that catches the first enemy struck, dealing magic damage and pulling them towards Blitzcrank.

skill_r.tooltip: Passive: While the ability is not on cooldown,  Blitzcrank's  basic attacks marks their target, stacking up to a cap. A mark detonates every second dealing magic damage to them.

skill_w.tooltip: Active:  Blitzcrank shifts into overdrive with dramatically increased  movement speed and  attack speed. When the effect ends, Blitzcrank is temporarily  slowed.

skill_e.tooltip: Active:  Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing magic damage to them. If the target is ablaze, the ability spreads to nearby enemies.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate:  Brand's abilities set his targets ablaze, dealing a percentage of their  maximum health in magic damage. This effect may stack up to 3 times, upon which  champions and  large monsters becomes unstable and detonates in a large area around them dealing massive magic damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Active:  Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage for the first target it hits. If the target is ablaze, the ability will  stun the target.

skill_r.tooltip: Active:  Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing magic damage each time it bounces, up to 5 bounces. If a target is ablaze, the ability will briefly  slow them.

skill_w.tooltip: Active: After a short delay,  Brand creates a pillar of flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within. Units that are ablaze take increased damage.

skill_e.tooltip: Active:  Braum raises his shield in a direction for several seconds, intercepting all projectiles causing them to hit him and be destroyed. He negates the damage of the first attack completely and reduces the damage of all subsequent attacks from this direction.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate:  Braum's  basic attacks and  Winter's Bite apply Concussive Blows. Once the first stack is applied, ally  basic attacks also stack Concussive Blows. Upon reaching 4 stacks, the target is  stunned and takes magic damage. For the next few seconds they cannot receive new stacks, but take bonus magic damage from  Braum's  basic attacks.

skill_q.tooltip: Active:  Braum propels freezing ice from his shield,  slowing and dealing magic damage to the first target hit. Applies a stack of  Concussive Blows.

skill_r.tooltip: Active:  Braum slams the ground,  knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that  slows enemies.

skill_w.tooltip: Active:  Braum  dashes to a target allied  champion or  minion. On arrival, both of them gain  armor and  magic resistance for a few seconds.

skill_e.tooltip: Active:  Caitlyn fires a heavy net that  slows the first target hit and deals magic damage to them. The recoil  dashes her back.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Every few  basic attack  Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus physical damage that scales with her  critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets,  Caitlyn's headshot  attack range is doubled.

skill_q.tooltip: Active:  Caitlyn revs up her rifle to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage to all enemies hit. The projectile expands after the first target but also deal less damage.

skill_r.tooltip: Active:  Caitlyn targets an enemy  champion and takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive physical damage to them at a huge range. The target's allied  champions can intercept the bullet for them.

skill_w.tooltip: Active:  Caitlyn peroidically stocks a trap, up to a cap.

skill_e.tooltip:
Camille pulls herself to a wall, leaping off and knocking up enemies upon landing.

Camille pulls herself to a wall, leaping off and knocking up enemies upon landing.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Periodically,  Camille's next  basic attack on  champions grant a  shield against their damage (physical or magical) for a short time.

skill_q.tooltip: Camille's next attack deals bonus damage and grants bonus movement speed. This spell can be recast for a short period of time, doing significantly increased bonus damage if Camille delays a period of time between the two attacks.

skill_r.tooltip: Camille dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks.

skill_w.tooltip: Camille blasts in a cone after a delay, dealing damage. Enemies in the outer half are slowed and take extra damage, while also healing Camille.

string_expression: 6%  of target's maximum health + 3.3% per 100 bonus AD
6.5%  of target's maximum health + 3.3% per 100 bonus AD
7%  of target's maximum health + 3.3% per 100 bonus AD
7.5%  of target's maximum health + 3.3% per 100 bonus AD
8%  of target's maximum health + 3.3% per 100 bonus AD

skill_e.tooltip: Cassiopeia lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, Cassiopeia regains Mana.

skill_i.tooltip: Cassiopeia gains Movement Speed per level, but she cannot purchase Boots items.

skill_q.tooltip: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.

skill_r.tooltip: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.

skill_w.tooltip: Cassiopeia releases several clouds of poison, slowing, grounding, and lightly damaging enemies that pass through them. Grounded enemies cannot use Movement abilities.

skill_e.tooltip: Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.

skill_i.tooltip: Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.

skill_q.tooltip: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.

skill_r.tooltip: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.

skill_w.tooltip: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.

skill_e.tooltip: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist.

skill_i.tooltip: Corki's basic attack deals a percentage of their damage as magic instead of physical. Every once in a while, The Package arrives in Corki's base to be picked up, temporarily granting him out of combat Movement Speed and upgrading Valkyrie into Special Delivery.

skill_q.tooltip: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.

skill_r.tooltip: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.

skill_w.tooltip:
Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.

Corki hurtles forward a long distance, knocking aside enemies and creating a trail of scorched earth that damages opponents who remain in it.

skill_e.tooltip: Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.

skill_i.tooltip: Darius aims his attacks strategically, causing his target to bleed. This effect stacks up to five times. Enemies that reach max Hemorrhage cause Darius to gain Noxian Might, greatly increasing his damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Darius winds up and swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle. Darius heals based on enemy champions hit by the blade.

skill_r.tooltip: Darius leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. If Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is refreshed for a brief duration.

skill_w.tooltip: Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their Movement Speed is slowed.

skill_e.tooltip: Diana dashes to an enemy and deals magic damage. Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to teleport to a target afflicted with Moonlight.

skill_i.tooltip: Every third strike cleaves nearby enemies for additional magic damage. Every spell cast grants attack speed for the next 3 attacks.

skill_q.tooltip: Diana swings her blade to unleash a bolt of lunar energy that deals damage in an arc before exploding. Afflicts enemies struck with the Moonlight debuff, revealing them if they are not stealthed.

skill_r.tooltip: Diana draws in and slows all nearby enemies.

skill_w.tooltip: Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength.

skill_e.tooltip: Dr. Mundo gains bonus attack damage based on his missing health, and his next basic attack headbutts his target for additional damage. Passively increases magic resist whenever Dr. Mundo is dealt magic damage or pays a health cost.

skill_i.tooltip: Dr. Mundo regenerates 0.3% of his maximum Health each second.

skill_q.tooltip: Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing damage equal to a portion of his target's current Health and slowing them for a short time. Dr. Mundo delights in the suffering of others, so he is returned half of the Health cost when he successfully lands a cleaver (increased to the full Health cost on killing blows).

skill_r.tooltip: Dr. Mundo sacrifices a portion of his Health for increased Movement Speed and drastically increased Health Regeneration.

skill_w.tooltip: Dr. Mundo drains his Health to reduce the duration of disables and deal continual damage to nearby enemies.

skill_e.tooltip: Draven throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.

skill_i.tooltip: Draven gains his fans' Adoration when he catches a Spinning Axe or kills a minion, monster, or tower. Killing enemy champions grants Draven bonus gold based on how much Adoration he has.

skill_q.tooltip: Draven's next attack will deal bonus physical damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.

skill_r.tooltip: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction.

skill_w.tooltip: Draven gains increased Movement Speed and Attack Speed. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.

skill_e.tooltip: Ekko rolls evasively while charging up his Z-Drive. His next attack deals bonus damage and warps reality, teleporting him to his target.

skill_i.tooltip: Ekko's Zero-Drive charges his spells and attacks with temporal energy. The third hit deals bonus damage and, if the target is a champion, Ekko gains accelerated movement speed.

skill_q.tooltip: Ekko throws a temporal grenade that expands into a time-distortion field upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing and damaging anyone caught inside. After a delay, the grenade rewinds back to Ekko, dealing damage on its return.

skill_r.tooltip: Ekko shatters his timeline, becoming untargetable and rewinding to a more favorable point in time. He returns to whenever he was a few seconds ago, and heals for a percentage of the damage received in that duration. Enemies near his arrival zone take massive damage.

string_expression: 100 + 60% AP + 3% per 1% of health lost in the past 4 seconds
150 + 60% AP + 3% per 1% of health lost in the past 4 seconds
200 + 60% AP + 3% per 1% of health lost in the past 4 seconds

skill_w.tooltip: Ekko splits the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If Ekko enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and triggers a detonation, stunning enemies by suspending them in time.

skill_e.tooltip:
Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy.

skill_i.tooltip: Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling. Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.

skill_q.tooltip:
Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.

skill_e.tooltip: Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains movement speed for a short duration.

skill_i.tooltip: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.

skill_q.tooltip: Evelynn strikes out with her Lasher, dealing damage to the first unit hit. Then, Evelynn can shoot a line of spikes at nearby foes up to 3 times.

skill_r.tooltip: Evelynn briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance.

skill_w.tooltip: Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.

skill_e.tooltip: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit.

skill_i.tooltip: Ezreal gains increasing Attack Speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to 5 times.

skill_q.tooltip: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns by 1.5 seconds if it strikes an enemy unit.

skill_r.tooltip: Ezreal winds up for 1 second to fire a powerful barrage of energy missiles which do massive damage to each unit they pass through (deals 10% less damage to each unit it passes through).

skill_w.tooltip: Ezreal fires an orb that sticks to the first champion or objective hit. If Ezreal hits an enemy with the orb, it detonates and deals damage.

skill_e.tooltip: Fiddlesticks slashes and area with its scythe. All enemies hit are slowed and those hit in the center are silenced.

skill_i.tooltip: Fiddlestick can summon an effigy of himself which occupies his trinket slot. This can reveal and disable wards and stealthed traps.

skill_q.tooltip: Damaging enemies with spells while unseen or targeting an enemy with Terrify's activation hits a target with fear, causing the target to flee in fear for a duration

skill_e.tooltip: Garen performs a dance of death with his sword, dealing damage around him for the duration and shredding the armor of enemy champions hit.

Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further.

Mega Gnar is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him.

skill_i.tooltip: While in combat Gnar generates Rage. At maximum Rage his next ability will transform him into Mega Gnar, granting increased survivability and access to new spells.

skill_q.tooltip:
Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced.

Mega Gnar instead throws a boulder that stops on the first unit hit, damaging and slowing everything nearby. It can then be picked up to reduce the cooldown.

skill_r.tooltip: Mega Gnar throws everything around him in a chosen direction, dealing damage and slowing them. Any enemy that hits a wall is stunned and takes bonus damage.

skill_w.tooltip:
Gnar's attacks and spells hype him up, dealing bonus damage and granting him Movement Speed.

Mega Gnar is too enraged to be hyper and instead can rear up on his hind legs and smash down on the area in front of him, stunning enemies in an area.

skill_e.tooltip: Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them.

skill_i.tooltip: On ability use, Gragas takes a drink restoring 6% of his max Health. This effect can only happen every 8 seconds.

skill_q.tooltip: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. Enemies struck by the blast have their Movement Speed slowed.

skill_r.tooltip: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.

skill_w.tooltip: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.

skill_e.tooltip: Graves dashes forward gaining an Armor boost for several seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.

skill_r.tooltip: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.

skill_w.tooltip: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke. Enemies inside the smoke cloud have reduced sight range and Movement Speed.

skill_e.tooltip: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.

skill_q.tooltip: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage.

skill_w.tooltip: Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that converge on his cursor.

skill_e.tooltip: Illaoi rips the spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her. Spirits echo a percentage of the damage they take to the original target. If killed, or if the target gets too far from the spirit, the target will become a Vessel and begin spawning Tentacles.

skill_i.tooltip: Illaoi and the Vessels she creates spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at spirits, Vessels, and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit, and will heal Illaoi if they damage a champion.

skill_q.tooltip: Increases the damage dealt by Tentacles. When activated, Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle that deals physical damage.

skill_r.tooltip: Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. A Tentacle spawns for each enemy champion hit.

skill_w.tooltip: Illaoi leaps to her target, dealing physical damage and causing nearby Tentacles to also swing at the target.

skill_r.tooltip: When mounted, Kled and Skaarl charges to the target location granting lots of bonus Movement Speed to the duo and ally champions. Skaarl homes in on the first enemy champion, dealing damage and knocking them back.

skill_w.tooltip: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.

skill_e.tooltip: LeBlanc flings illusionary chains towards a target location. If it hits an enemy unit, it will deal initial magic damage and shackle them. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, the target takes additional magic damage and is unable to move.

skill_i.tooltip: When LeBlanc drops below 40% health, she becomes invisible for 1 second and creates a Mirror Image that deals no damage and lasts for up to 8 seconds.

skill_q.tooltip: LeBlanc projects a sigil, dealing damage and marking the target for a short duration. Damaging the marked target with any ability detonates the sigil, dealing additional damage.

skill_r.tooltip: LeBlanc can recast any of abiliites a second time.

skill_w.tooltip: LeBlanc rapidly dashes to a target location, dealing magic damage to nearby units. In the following 4 seconds, she can activate Distortion again to return to her starting location.

skill_e.tooltip:
Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple for the next 3 seconds.

Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.

skill_i.tooltip: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain 40% Attack Speed and return 20/10 Energy.

skill_q.tooltip:
Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.

Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage.

skill_r.tooltip: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.

skill_e.tooltip: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.

skill_i.tooltip: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.

skill_r.tooltip: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed. Afterward, Leona's sword is charged with the power of the sun and deals bonus magic damage for a few attacks.

skill_w.tooltip: Leona raises her shield to gain Armor and Magic Resist. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.

skill_e.tooltip: Lillia hurls a seed that damages and slows those it lands on. It will roll indefinitely unless it hits a wall or a target.

skill_i.tooltip: Lillia's abilities apply Dream Dust which deals magic damage over a few seconds.

skill_q.tooltip: Passively, Lillia gains stacking movement speed when hitting enemies with spells. She can activate this to deal magic damage enemies around her in a circle, dealing extra true damage on the edge.

skill_r.tooltip: Lillia renders all champions affected by Dream Dust drowsy, slowing them for a few seconds then making them fall asleep afterwards.

skill_w.tooltip: Lillia deals damage in a nearby area, dealing heavy damage in the center.

skill_e.tooltip: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.

skill_i.tooltip: Whenever an enemy champion dies while Lissandra is near, an invulnerable and untargetable ice spirit chases nearby visible enemies, slowing and dealing magic damage after a few seconds.

skill_q.tooltip: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Movement Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.

skill_r.tooltip: If cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, healing herself while becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Movement Speed.

skill_w.tooltip: Freezes nearby enemies in ice, dealing magic damage and rooting them.

skill_e.tooltip: Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.

skill_i.tooltip: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot.

skill_q.tooltip: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.

skill_r.tooltip: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.

skill_w.tooltip: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking enemies. Lucian gains Movement Speed for attacking marked enemies.

skill_e.tooltip: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.

skill_i.tooltip: Pix is a wild Faerie that accompanies Lulu. Pix will fire a barrage of magical energy at targets that Lulu attacks.

skill_q.tooltip: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that heavily slows all enemies it hits. An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.

skill_r.tooltip: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.

skill_w.tooltip: If cast on an ally, grants them Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.

skill_e.tooltip: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.

skill_i.tooltip: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for 6 seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.

skill_q.tooltip: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.

skill_r.tooltip: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. If Final Spark kills a champion, part of its cooldown is refunded. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.

skill_w.tooltip: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.

skill_e.tooltip: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.

skill_i.tooltip: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for 10 seconds, this effect recharges.

skill_q.tooltip: Using his primal elemental magic, Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

skill_r.tooltip: Malphite ferociously charges to a location, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.

skill_w.tooltip: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Passively increases his Armor (this amount is tripled while Granite Shield is active).

skill_e.tooltip: Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage over time. Using Malzahar's other spells on the target will refresh the visions. If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.

skill_i.tooltip: When he hasn't recently taken damage or been crowd controlled, Malzahar gains massive damage reduction and crowd control immunity, lingering for a short period after taking damage. Damage from lane minions is unaffected.

skill_q.tooltip: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions.

skill_r.tooltip: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.

skill_e.tooltip: Miss Fortune reveals an area with a flurry of bullets, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.

skill_i.tooltip: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she attacks a new target.

skill_q.tooltip: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.

skill_r.tooltip: Miss Fortune channels a flurry of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike.

skill_w.tooltip: Miss Fortune passively gains Movement Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.

skill_e.tooltip: Mordekaiser pulls all enemies in an area.

skill_i.tooltip: Mordekaiser's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage on-hit. Damaging enemy champions grants stacks and on 3 stacks, he deals bonus damage in an area around him for a few seconds.

skill_q.tooltip: Mordekaiser smashes the ground with his mace dealing magic damage to all enemies struck. Damage is increased when hitting a single enemy.

skill_r.tooltip: Mordekaiser sends the targeted champion into the Death Realm for a few seconds, stealing some of their stats.

skill_w.tooltip: Mordekaiser stores damage he deals and takes. Activating this ability creates a shield that he can activate again to consume the shield and heal.

skill_e.tooltip: Places a protective barrier around an allied champion, absorbing magical damage and disables until penetrated or the shield dissipates.

skill_i.tooltip: Morgana has Spell Vamp, healing herself whenever she deals damage with her spells.

skill_r.tooltip: Latches chains of energy onto nearby enemy champions, dealing initial damage to them and slowing their Movement Speed, and then echoing the pain a few seconds later and stunning them if they remain close to Morgana.

skill_w.tooltip: Infects an area with desecrated soil, causing enemy units who stand on the location to take continual damage.

skill_e.tooltip: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.

skill_i.tooltip: When Nami's abilities hit allied champions they gain Movement Speed for a short duration.

skill_q.tooltip: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.

skill_r.tooltip: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.

skill_w.tooltip: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.

skill_e.tooltip: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.

skill_i.tooltip: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.

skill_q.tooltip: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.

skill_r.tooltip: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance for the duration.

skill_i.tooltip: Neeko can look like an ally champion. Champion combat or casting damaging spells breaks the disguise.

skill_q.tooltip: Neeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units.

skill_r.tooltip: Neeko leaps up and charges a blossom shielding her for a few seconds. Upon landing, she deals magic damage and stuns enemies within her blast radius.

skill_e.tooltip:
In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration.

As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.

skill_i.tooltip: Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Movement Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 1400 range. Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss or Bushwhack triggers a Hunt, granting True Sight of them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Movement Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted target) and her Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them.

skill_q.tooltip:
In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies.

As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.

skill_r.tooltip: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.

skill_w.tooltip:
In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target.

As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.

skill_e.tooltip: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and terrifying the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.

skill_i.tooltip: Every 10 seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for 120% physical damage and heals himself. Nocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

skill_q.tooltip: Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and has increased Movement Speed and Attack Damage.

skill_r.tooltip: Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision in the process. He can then launch himself at a nearby enemy champion.

skill_w.tooltip: Nocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining Attack Speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive Attack Speed if successful.

skill_e.tooltip: Nunu throws multiple snowballs that damage enemies. When he's finished, Willump roots any champions or large monsters that were hit by a snowball.

skill_i.tooltip: Nunu and Willump and the nearest allied champion gains bonus Attack Speed and bonus Movement Speed. Willump gans bonus physical damage to enemies behind the target.

skill_q.tooltip: Nunu consumes a minion, monster, or enemy champion dealing damage and healing a portion of the damage.

skill_r.tooltip: Nunu and Willump start channeling for a few seconds, slowing enemies and gaining a shield. At the end of the duration or if the channel is interrupted, enemies takes magic damage.

skill_w.tooltip: Willump creates a snowball that grows in size and speed as he rolls it. The snowball explodes when hitting terrain or champions, damaging and knocking up enemies that are hit.

skill_e.tooltip: Olaf attacks with such force that it deals true damage to his target and himself, refunding the Health cost if he destroys the target.

skill_i.tooltip: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased by 1% for each 1% of his Health he is missing.

skill_q.tooltip: Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to enemies it passes through and slowing their Movement Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's  cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.

skill_r.tooltip: Olaf temporarily becomes immune to disables.

skill_w.tooltip: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased, he gains Life Steal and has increased healing from all sources based on how much Health he is missing.

skill_e.tooltip: Orianna commands her Ball to attach to an allied champion, shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the Ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to.

skill_i.tooltip: Orianna's autoattack deals additional magic damage. This damage increases the more Orianna attacks the same target.

skill_q.tooltip: Orianna commands her Ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her Ball remains at the target location after.

skill_r.tooltip: Orianna commands her Ball to unleash a shockwave, dealing magic damage and launching nearby enemies towards the Ball after a short delay.

skill_w.tooltip: Orianna commands the Ball to release a pulse of energy, dealing magic damage around it. This leaves a field behind that speeds up allies and slows enemies.

skill_e.tooltip: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.

skill_i.tooltip: Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere. Additionally, when Ornn reaches level 13 masterwork upgrades for some items become available for Ornn and his team to purchase. Ornn can smith items directly from his forge menu or the shop.

skill_q.tooltip: Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location.

skill_r.tooltip: Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up for 1 second, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.

skill_w.tooltip: Ornn advances unstoppably, breathing fire and shielding himself. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.

skill_e.tooltip: Pantheon sets his shield in a direction, gaining invulnerability to damage from enemies in that direction and dealing damage continuously. The last hit is extra powerful and still activates if E is canceled early. Empowered: Aegis Assault lasts longer.

skill_i.tooltip: After five basic attacks or ability cast, Pantheon's next basic ability (Q, W, or E) is empowered.

skill_q.tooltip: Tap: Pantheon strikes in a direction, damaging all enemies in a line. Hold: Pantheon throws his spear in a line. Empowered: Enemies take extra damage and are slowed.

skill_r.tooltip: Pantheon leaps into the air and then hurtles back toward a target location, damaging enemies as he passes through. Mortal Will activates immediately when he lands.

skill_w.tooltip: Pantheon leaps to a target enemy, dealing damage and stunning them. Empowered: Pantheon's next basic attack hits three times, each at reduced damage.

skill_e.tooltip: Poppy dashes to the target and pushes it back. If the target is pushed into a wall, it is stunned.

skill_i.tooltip: Poppy throws her buckler, gaining range and bonus magic damage. The buckler lands at a nearby location and Poppy can pick it up to gain a shield. Enemies can step on the buckler to destroy it.

skill_q.tooltip: Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay.

skill_w.tooltip: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him, but he is also slowed during this time.

skill_e.tooltip:
Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing double and True Damage if she has max Fury.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.

skill_i.tooltip: While unburrowed Rek'Sai generates Fury with her basic attacks and spells. When burrowed Rek'Sai consumes Fury to heal herself.

skill_q.tooltip:
Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Physical Damage and reveals enemies hit.

skill_r.tooltip: Rek'Sai dives underground and leaps towards her target, dealing massive damage.

string_expression: 100 + 175% bonus AD + 20% of target's missing health
250 + 175% bonus AD + 25% of target's missing health
400 + 175% bonus AD + 30% of target's missing health

skill_w.tooltip:
Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Movement Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.

skill_e.tooltip:
Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.

Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.

skill_i.tooltip: Renekton gains Fury for every autoattack he makes. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects. Additionally, Renekton gains bonus Fury when he is low on life.

skill_q.tooltip: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.

skill_r.tooltip: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.

skill_w.tooltip: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, dealing high physical damage and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.

skill_e.tooltip: Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration. Ferocity effect: roots the target.

skill_i.tooltip: While in brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack. Rengar's abilities build Ferocity. Upon reaching full Ferocity, his next ability becomes empowered and grants him Movement Speed on cast, but he instantly loses all Ferocity if he leaves combat. Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, permanently increasing his Attack Damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Rengar's next attack stabs his target for bonus damage. If Rengar has full ferocity, he deals increased damage and grants extra Attack Speed.

skill_r.tooltip: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, Camouflaging him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Movement Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy for a guaranteed critical strike, even without being in brush.

skill_w.tooltip: Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken. Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.

skill_e.tooltip: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.

skill_i.tooltip: Riven's abilities charge her blade, causing her basic attacks to deal bonus physical damage. Riven's blade may be charged up to three times and expends one charge per attack.

skill_q.tooltip: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.

skill_r.tooltip:
Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.

Riven unleashes a powerful ranged attack, which she may do once during Blade of the Exile.

skill_w.tooltip: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.

skill_e.tooltip: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.

skill_i.tooltip: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.

skill_q.tooltip: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.

skill_r.tooltip: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.

skill_w.tooltip: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.

skill_e.tooltip: Ryze releases an orb of pure magical power that damages an enemy and debuffs them. Ryze's spells have additional effects against the debuffed enemy.

skill_i.tooltip: Ryze's spells deal extra damage based on his Bonus Mana, and he gains a percentage increase to his maximum Mana based on his Ability Power.

skill_q.tooltip: Passively, Ryze's other damaging spells reset Overload and begin to charge a Rune that can be used to empower Overload. On cast, Ryze throws a charge of pure energy in a line, dealing damage to the first enemy struck. If a Rune is fully charged, Ryze also gains Movement Speed.

skill_r.tooltip: Ryze creates a portal to a nearby location. After a few seconds, allies standing near the portal are teleported to the target location.

skill_w.tooltip: Ryze traps a target enemy unit in a cage of runes, damaging them and preventing them from moving.

skill_e.tooltip: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.

skill_i.tooltip: After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage. Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.

skill_r.tooltip: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.

skill_w.tooltip: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage and applying Frost stacks.

skill_e.tooltip: Senna dissolves into a cloud of mist, gaining movement speed and camouflaging her and her nearby allies. Teammates who emerge from the mist appear as unclickable wraiths to enemies until they either attack or get close.

skill_i.tooltip: Senna's Relic Cannon is slow to fire, but deals bonus damage. She can power up its range, Attack Damage, and Crit chance over time by absorbing Mist from enemy champions she's attacking or from wraiths that spawn from dead enemies.

skill_q.tooltip: Senna fires a bolt that heals her allies, and damages her foes. Senna can keep attacking to decrease Piercing Darkness’ cooldown.

skill_r.tooltip: Senna fires a global beam. Allies in the beam are shielded and enemies caught in the center of it take damage.

skill_w.tooltip: Senna commands the Mist onto the first target hit, damaging them and then rooting that target and surrounding enemies after a brief delay.

skill_e.tooltip: Sett pulls in all enemies on opposite sites of him, dealing damage and stunning them. If enemies were only on one side, they are slowed instead of stunned.

skill_i.tooltip: Sett alternates between a Left Punch and a Right Punch when attacking. His Right PUnch gains bonus range, attacks faster, and deals bonus physical damage. Sett also regenerates health depending on his missing health.

skill_q.tooltip: Sett's next two auto attacks deal additional damage based off the target's max health. Sett also gains movement speed while moving towards enemy champions.

skill_e.tooltip: Shaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing their movement speed. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target. The thrown Shiv deals bonus damage based on the target's missing Health.

skill_i.tooltip: Shaco's basic attack critically strikes for extra damage when striking a unit from behind. Units can't be Backstabbed more than once every few seconds, modified by Shaco's cooldown reduction.

skill_q.tooltip: Shaco becomes Invisible and teleports to target location.

skill_r.tooltip: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies (Deals reduced damage to turrets). Upon death, it explodes, spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes and dealing damage to nearby enemies.

skill_w.tooltip: Shaco creates a hidden animated Jack-in-the-Box. When triggered, it will fear and attack nearby enemies.

skill_e.tooltip: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.

skill_i.tooltip: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.

skill_q.tooltip: Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen.

skill_r.tooltip: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.

skill_w.tooltip: Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked.

skill_e.tooltip: Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit. Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.

skill_i.tooltip: Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.

skill_q.tooltip: Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds. Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.

skill_r.tooltip: Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location. Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.

skill_w.tooltip: Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Movement Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout. Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.

skill_e.tooltip: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.

skill_i.tooltip: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of movement speed when passing them.

skill_q.tooltip: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.

skill_r.tooltip: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.

skill_w.tooltip: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.

skill_e.tooltip: Active:  Sion fires a short range shockwave that deals magic damage,  slows and  reduces the armor of the first enemy struck. If this enemy is a  minion or  monster, it will be  knocked back further, dealing the effect to all enemies that it passes through.

skill_i.tooltip:
Innate: Upon death, Sion reanimates with his health decaying increasingly fast. His basic attacks become very rapid, gain 100% lifesteal and deal 10% enemy maximum health as physical damage on-hit, capped against monsters. His abilities are replaced by Death Surge, which grants a burst of movement speed.

Active: Sion's Glory in Death gains a short burst of decaying movement speed.

skill_q.tooltip: Active:  Sion  charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal physical damage to enemies when released. If  channeled for at least 1 second, enemies will also be  knocked up and  stunned.

skill_r.tooltip: Active:  Sion  charges in a direction, becoming  Cc-immune and ramping up speed over time. He can steer this charge slightly. When he collides with an enemy  champion or terrain, or ends the  charge otherwise, he slams the ground to deal physical damage in an area and  knock up enemies directly hit. Damage and CC duration increase with the  channel time.

skill_w.tooltip: Passive:  Sion gains  bonus health whenever he kills a unit.

skill_e.tooltip: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives Mana back if a spell is blocked.

skill_i.tooltip: Sivir gains a short burst of Movement Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.

skill_q.tooltip: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.

skill_r.tooltip: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge Movement Speed for a period of time. Additionally passively grants Sivir bonus Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.

skill_w.tooltip: Sivir's next few basic attacks will bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage to secondary targets.

skill_e.tooltip: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals damage to enemies struck and slows them. Basic attacking these enemies within a short window will stun them.

skill_i.tooltip: Skarner's presence causes crystals to spawn in set locations around the map. While near crystals his team owns, Skarner gains tremendous movement speed, attack speed, and mana regeneration.

skill_q.tooltip: Skarner lashes out with his claws, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and charging himself with Crystal Energy for several seconds if a unit is struck. If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage.

skill_w.tooltip: Skarner gains a shield and has increased Movement Speed while the shield persists.

skill_e.tooltip: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Movement Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Movement Speed on their next attack.

skill_i.tooltip: After casting 3 spells, Sona's next attack deals bonus magic damage in addition to a bonus effect depending on what song Sona last activated.

skill_q.tooltip: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies.

skill_r.tooltip: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them. Each rank reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities.

skill_w.tooltip: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.

skill_e.tooltip: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.

skill_i.tooltip: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.

skill_q.tooltip: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers health and gains movement speed when moving away from enemy champions.

skill_r.tooltip: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all friendly champions.

skill_w.tooltip: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.

skill_e.tooltip: Swain launches a wave of demonic power forward. It then returns to Swain and roots enemies it hits.

skill_i.tooltip: Swain's ravens collect Soul Fragments that heal him. Swain can right-click an immobilized enemy champions to pull them closer to him, dealing damage and ripping out a Soul Fragment.

skill_q.tooltip: Swain unleashes several bolts of eldritch power that pierce through enemies hit and stop on impact with enemy champions. Enemies hit take more damage for each bolt they are struck by.

skill_r.tooltip: Swain transforms into a demon and drains health from nearby enemy champions, minions, and neutral monsters. Swain can cast Demonflare to deal damage equal to the amount of health he drained, ending his transformation to decimate nearby enemies with a nova of soulfire.

skill_w.tooltip: Swain summons an eye at the target location, revealing an area and dealing magic damage and slowing enemies after a few seconds.

skill_e.tooltip: Sylas dashes to a location. When recast, he throws his chains out, pulling himself to any enemy he htis and knocks them up for short duration.

skill_i.tooltip: Sylas stacks of Unshackled for every every ability cast. He gains bonus Attack Speed and his next basic attack deals damage around him, consuming a stack of Unshackled.

skill_q.tooltip: Sylas lashes his chains out, intersecting at his targeted location dealing damaging and slowing enemies hit. After a short delay, the targeted location's intersection point explodes dealing extra damage.

skill_r.tooltip: Sylas steals any target ultimate. Sylas can only steal ultimates that have not been stolen before for a few seconds.

skill_w.tooltip: Sylas lunges at an enemy dealing execute based damage and healing himself against enemy champions.

skill_e.tooltip: Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.

skill_i.tooltip: Spells gain extra effects at max rank. Dark Sphere: Sphere's lifetime is increased to 8 seconds. Force of Will: Deals 20% bonus true damage. Scatter the Weak: Spell width increased by 50%. Unleashed Power: Range increased by 75.

skill_q.tooltip: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.

skill_r.tooltip: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.

skill_w.tooltip: Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Movement Speed of enemies.

skill_e.tooltip: Tahm Kench turns incoming damage into gray health. As gray health decays, Tahm Kench is healed for a percentage of the gray health amount. When activated, this ability turns all gray health into a shield.

skill_i.tooltip: Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks and abilities, gaining extra damage based on his total health. Damaging enemy champions builds stacks of An Acquired Taste. At three stacks, he can use Devour on an enemy champion.

skill_q.tooltip: Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit. This ability gains a stun after three stacks of An Acquired Taste.

skill_r.tooltip: Tahm Kench teleports across the map, and he may bring one ally champion with him.

skill_w.tooltip:
Tahm Kench devours a target, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage. He can spit devoured minions and monsters out as a skillshot that deals magic damage in an area upon impact.

Tahm Kench devours a target, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage. He can spit devoured minions and monsters out as a skillshot that deals magic damage in an area upon impact.

skill_e.tooltip: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield that explodes if enemies dash through it or are pushed/pulled through it.

skill_i.tooltip: Taliyah gains movement speed near walls.

skill_q.tooltip: Taliyah throws a volley of missiles in a target direction, moving freely as she does. This works the ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on worked ground, she only throws one missile.

skill_r.tooltip: Stone Weaver creates a very long wall and then surfs it.

skill_w.tooltip: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within in a direction of her choosing.

skill_e.tooltip: Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.

skill_i.tooltip: Talon's spells Wound champions and epic monsters, stacking up to 3 times. When Talon attacks a champion with 3 stacks of Wound, they bleed for heavy damage over time.

skill_q.tooltip: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.

skill_r.tooltip: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes Invisible while gaining additional Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from Invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.

skill_w.tooltip: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.

skill_e.tooltip: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.

skill_i.tooltip: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.

skill_q.tooltip: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.

skill_r.tooltip: Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration.

skill_w.tooltip: Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion. Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.

skill_e.tooltip: Each of Teemo's attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds.

main.attribute: Total Magic Damage in a Single Hit

skill_i.tooltip: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes Invisible indefinitely. If he's in brush, Teemo can enter and maintain his Invisibility while moving. After leaving Invisibility, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

skill_q.tooltip: Obscures an enemy's vision with a powerful venom, dealing damage to the target unit and blinding it for the duration.

skill_r.tooltip: Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If Teemo throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range.

skill_w.tooltip: Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his Movement Speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus Movement Speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.

skill_e.tooltip: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.

skill_i.tooltip: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.

skill_q.tooltip: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.

skill_r.tooltip: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.

skill_w.tooltip: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.

skill_e.tooltip: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.

skill_i.tooltip: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.

skill_q.tooltip: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.

skill_r.tooltip: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.

skill_w.tooltip: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.

skill_e.tooltip: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.

skill_i.tooltip: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he  heals for a percent of its maximum Health.

skill_q.tooltip: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.

skill_r.tooltip: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled.
