skill_q.tooltip: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.

skill_r.tooltip: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.

skill_w.tooltip: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Movement Speed reduced.

skill_e.tooltip: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.

skill_i.tooltip: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving anywhere between 1 and 6 bonus gold.

skill_q.tooltip: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.

skill_r.tooltip: Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.

skill_w.tooltip: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.

skill_e.tooltip: Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.

skill_i.tooltip: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.

skill_q.tooltip: Twitch becomes Camouflaged for a short duration and gains Movement Speed. When leaving Camouflage, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration. When an enemy champion with Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset.

skill_r.tooltip: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.

skill_w.tooltip: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.

skill_e.tooltip: Bear Stance: Activation - Udyr increases Movement Speed for a short duration. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks stun his target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target for several seconds.

skill_i.tooltip: Entering a stance grants Udyr bonus Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short duration. This effect can stack multiple times.

skill_q.tooltip: Tiger Stance: Activation - Udyr's Attack Speed is increased for a few seconds. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after will deal a high amount of damage over 2 seconds.

skill_r.tooltip: Phoenix Stance: Activation - Udyr unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after engulfs enemies in front of him with flames.

skill_w.tooltip: Turtle Stance: Activation - Udyr gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after heals him for 2.5% of his maximum health.

skill_e.tooltip: Urgot charges in a direction, trampling non-champion enemies. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them out of his way.

skill_i.tooltip: Urgot's basic attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts of flame from his legs, dealing physical damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Fires an explosive charge at the target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies caught in the explosion.

skill_r.tooltip: Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them.

skill_w.tooltip: Urgot shields himself, slowing himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions Urgot has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames.

skill_e.tooltip: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Movement Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.

skill_i.tooltip: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.

skill_q.tooltip: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.

skill_r.tooltip: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.

skill_w.tooltip: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health.

string_expression: 3%  of the target's maximum health + 2% per 100 AP
3.5%  of the target's maximum health + 2% per 100 AP
4%  of the target's maximum health + 2% per 100 AP
4.5%  of the target's maximum health + 2% per 100 AP

12%  of the target's maximum health + 6% per 100 AP
13.5%  of the target's maximum health + 6% per 100 AP
15%  of the target's maximum health + 6% per 100 AP

skill_e.tooltip: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.

skill_i.tooltip: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining 30 movement speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.

skill_q.tooltip: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack critically strikes.

skill_r.tooltip: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, and triple the bonus Movement Speed from Night Hunter.

skill_w.tooltip: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's maximum Health as bonus true damage. (Max: 200 damage vs. Monsters)

skill_e.tooltip: After a brief delay Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, stunning enemies who pass through the perimeter.

skill_i.tooltip: Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.

skill_q.tooltip: Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Veigar some ability power permanently.

skill_r.tooltip: Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large amount of magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.

skill_w.tooltip: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands. Stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown.

skill_e.tooltip: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.

skill_i.tooltip: Vel'Koz's abilities apply Organic Deconstruction to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.

skill_r.tooltip: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.

skill_w.tooltip: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.

skill_e.tooltip: Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it.

skill_i.tooltip: Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.

skill_q.tooltip: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.

skill_r.tooltip: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.

skill_w.tooltip: Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed.

string_expression: 4%  of target's maximum health + 0[ 1% per 35 ][ 2.86% per 100 ]bonus AD
5.5%  of target's maximum health + 0[ 1% per 35 ][ 2.86% per 100 ]bonus AD
7%  of target's maximum health + 0[ 1% per 35 ][ 2.86% per 100 ]bonus AD
8.5%  of target's maximum health + 0[ 1% per 35 ][ 2.86% per 100 ]bonus AD
10%  of target's maximum health + 0[ 1% per 35 ][ 2.86% per 100 ]bonus AD

skill_e.tooltip: Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to all enemies in its path. Augment: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing magic damage.

skill_i.tooltip: Viktor starts with the Prototype Hex Core that can be upgraded three times in the store to augment his abilities.

skill_q.tooltip: Viktor blasts an enemy unit dealing magic damage, gaining a shield and empowering his next basic attack. Augment: Viktor gains bonus Movement Speed after casting.

skill_r.tooltip: Viktor conjures a singularity on the field which deals magic damage and interrupts enemy channels. The singularity then periodically does magic damage to all nearby enemies. Viktor can redirect the singularity. Augment: The Chaos Storm moves faster.

skill_w.tooltip: Viktor conjures a heavy gravitational field that slows enemies in its radius. Enemies who stay within the device for too long are stunned. Augment: Enemies stunned by Gravity Field are dragged to the center.

skill_e.tooltip: Vladimir pays his own health to charge up a reservoir of blood which, when released, deals damage in the area around him but can be blocked by enemy units.

skill_i.tooltip: Every 40 points of bonus Health gives Vladimir 1 Ability Power and every 1 point of Ability Power gives Vladimir 1.4 bonus Health (does not stack with itself).

skill_q.tooltip: Vladimir steals life from the target enemy. When Vladimir's resource is full, Transfusion will benefit from massively increased damage and healing for a brief time.

skill_r.tooltip: Vladimir infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration. After a few seconds, Hemoplague deals magic damage to infected enemies and heals Vladimir for each enemy Champion hit.

skill_w.tooltip: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed and Vladimir siphons life from them.

skill_e.tooltip: Volibear summons a lightning bolt at a location dealing damagte and slowing enemies while granting Volibear a shield if he's inside the blast radius.

skill_i.tooltip: Volibear gains stacks of Relentless Storm, granting him bonus Attack Speed whenever he damages an enemy with basic attacks or abilities. At max stacks, he does chain lightning damage to the 4 nearest visible targets.

skill_q.tooltip: Volibear gains speed towards enemies, stunning and damaging the first one he attacks.

skill_r.tooltip: Volibear leaps to the target location, granting him immunity to Crowd Control, unit collision, and granting him bonus Health, range, and increased size. If he targets an enemy structure, it renders it unable to attack.

skill_w.tooltip: Volibear damages an enemy, applying on-hit effects and marking them. Casting this spell again on the same target deals bonus damage and heals Volibear.

skill_e.tooltip: Warwick gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.

skill_i.tooltip: Innate:  Warwick deals bonus magic damage on-hit. If he is  below 50% maximum health, he  heals the same amount. If he is  below 25%, this healing triples.

skill_q.tooltip: Active:  Warwick  lunges forward and bites his target, dealing magic damage based on their  maximum health and  healing for damage dealt. If the ability is held, he is attached to his target, following all of their movements while he  dash behind them.

string_expression: 120% AD + 100% AP + 6% of target's maximum health
120% AD + 100% AP + 7% of target's maximum health
120% AD + 100% AP + 8% of target's maximum health
120% AD + 100% AP + 9% of target's maximum health
120% AD + 100% AP + 10% of target's maximum health

skill_r.tooltip: Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus movement speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds.

skill_w.tooltip: Passive:  Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining movement speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 20% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.

skill_e.tooltip: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck.

skill_i.tooltip: Wukong gains bonus Armor per level and regenerates extra health, growing whenever a champion or monster is hit.

skill_q.tooltip: Wukong's next attack deals additional physical damage, gains range, and reduces the enemy's Armor for a short duration.

skill_r.tooltip: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell.

skill_w.tooltip: Wukong becomes invisible and dashes in a direction, leaving behind a clone that will attack nearby enemies and cast his Crushing Blow if the real one does.

skill_e.tooltip: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.

skill_i.tooltip: After using an ability, Xayah's next few basic attacks will hit all enemies along their path and dropping Feathers she can recall.

skill_q.tooltip: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.

skill_r.tooltip: Xayah leaps into the air, becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.

skill_w.tooltip: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her basic attack speed and damage while granting her movement speed if she attacks a champion.

skill_e.tooltip: Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.

skill_i.tooltip: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana.

skill_q.tooltip: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.

skill_r.tooltip: Xerath immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.

skill_w.tooltip: Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.

skill_e.tooltip: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in the area and slowing them briefly.

skill_i.tooltip: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.

skill_q.tooltip: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.

skill_r.tooltip: Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back. Xin Zhao is impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created.

string_expression: 75 + 100% bonus AD + 15% of target's current health
175 + 100% bonus AD + 15% of target's current health
275 + 100% bonus AD + 15% of target's current health

skill_w.tooltip: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward.

skill_e.tooltip: Dashes through a unit, dealing escalating Magic Damage with each cast.

skill_i.tooltip: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is doubled. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.

skill_q.tooltip: A skillshot basic attack. After two successful Steel Tempests, the next fires a tornado that knocks enemies Airborne.

skill_r.tooltip: Moves to a unit and strikes them repeatedly for heavy damage. Can only be cast on Airborne targets.

skill_w.tooltip: Creates a moving wall that blocks enemy projectiles.

skill_e.tooltip: Yone's spirit leaves his body behind, gaining movement speed. When the duration ends or when recast, Yone's spirit is forced back to his body and he repeats a portion of the damage his spirit dealt.

skill_i.tooltip: Yone doubles his total Critical Hit Chance, but only critical strikes deal less daamge. Yone's basic attacks alternate, dealing physical damage with his Steel Sword and magic damage with the other.

skill_q.tooltip: Yone thrusts his sword, damaging all enemies in a line. When a target is hit, Mortal Steel grants a stack of Gathering Storm for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, Mortal Steel dashes Yone forward knocking enemies Airborne.

skill_r.tooltip: Yone marks a line in the target directions, stunning targets and blinking in the direction. Any enemies hit are dealt both physical and magical damage, pulling them in and knocked them up.

skill_w.tooltip: Yone cleaves an area in front of him, damaging all enemies in a cone. This grants Yone a shield which icnreases on the number of champions hit. The cooldown and cast time scale with Attack Speed.

skill_e.tooltip: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that damages, slows and marks enemies.

skill_i.tooltip: Yorick can raise Mist Walkers with his abilities. Enemies that die near Yorick will sometimes leave a grave.

skill_q.tooltip:
Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target dies a grave will be dug.

Yorick summons Mist Walkers from the graves around him.

skill_r.tooltip: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.

skill_w.tooltip: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.

skill_e.tooltip: Yuumi heals herself and boosts her Movement Speed and Attack Speed. While attached, shes heals her attached ally.

skill_i.tooltip: Every so often, Yuumi's next attack against an opponent restores mana and generates a shield. If Yuumi is Attached, the shield protects her ally. The shield protects Yuumi or her ally until it's broken.

skill_q.tooltip: Yuumi fires a missle dealing damage to the first target hit. While attached, the missile can be controlled by your cursor. It deals bonus damage and slows if it takes at least 1 second to get to its target.

string_expression: 45 + 40% AP + 2% of the target's current health
85 + 40% AP + 3.2% of the target's current health
125 + 40% AP + 4.4% of the target's current health
165 + 40% AP + 5.6% of the target's current health
205 + 40% AP + 6.8% of the target's current health
245 + 40% AP + 8% of the target's current health

skill_r.tooltip: Yuumi launches waves in the target directions, dealing magic damage, reduced by subsequent waves, to enemy champions. When struck by three waves, they are rooted, occuring once per target.

skill_w.tooltip: Passively, Yuumi increases her ally's Adaptive Force and her own. Actively, Yuumi dashes and attaches to a target ally, becoming untargetable from everything except turrets.

skill_e.tooltip: Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.

skill_i.tooltip: Each time Zac hits an enemy with an ability, he sheds a chunk of himself that can be reabsorbed to restore Health. Upon taking fatal damage, Zac splits into 4 bloblets that attempt to recombine. If any bloblets remain, he will revive with an amount of Health depending on the Health of the surviving bloblets. Each bloblet has a percentage of Zac's maximum Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. This ability has a 5 minute cooldown.

skill_q.tooltip: Zac stretches an arm, grabbing an enemy. Attacking a different enemy will cause him to throw both targets towards each other.

skill_r.tooltip: Passively, Zac's blobs grant extra healing. Actively, Zac bounces, gaining bonus Movement Speed, dealing magic damage and knocking them back and slowing them for a short duration.

skill_w.tooltip: Zac's body erupts, damaging nearby enemies.

string_expression: 25 + 4% (+ 2% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
40 + 5% (+ 2% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
55 + 6% (+ 2% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
70 + 7% (+ 2% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
85 + 8% (+ 2% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health

skill_e.tooltip: Zed and his shadow spin their blades, creating a burst of shadow energy. The shadow's spin slows.

skill_i.tooltip: Zed's basic attacks against targets below 50% Health deal 6-10% of the target's maximum Health as bonus Magic Damage. This effect can only occur once every 10 seconds on the same target.

skill_q.tooltip: Zed and his shadow both throw their spinning blades forward, dealing damage to any targets they pass through.

skill_r.tooltip: Zed becomes untargetable and dashes to an enemy champion, marking them. After 3 seconds the mark triggers, repeating a portion of all the damage Zed dealt to the target while they were marked.

skill_w.tooltip: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for 5 seconds, and mimicking his spell casts. Zed can reactivate to swap places with the shadow.

skill_e.tooltip: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing.

skill_i.tooltip: Every 12 seconds, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.

skill_q.tooltip: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.

skill_r.tooltip: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away.

skill_w.tooltip: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage. Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets.

skill_e.tooltip: Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Movement Speed or increasing an ally's Movement Speed for a short time.

skill_i.tooltip: Zilean stores time as Experience. When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives. Cannot be used in combat.

skill_q.tooltip: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.

skill_r.tooltip: Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage.

skill_w.tooltip: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.

skill_e.tooltip: Causes the target to become drowsy, then fall asleep. The first source of damage that breaks the sleep is doubled, up to a cap.

skill_i.tooltip: Zoe's next basic attack after casting a spell deals bonus magic damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Zoe fires a missile that she can redirect in flight, which deals more damage the longer it flies in a straight line.

skill_r.tooltip: Blink to a nearby position for 1 second. Then blink back.

skill_w.tooltip: Zoe can pick up the remnants of enemy summoner spell and active item casts and cast them once herself. Whenever she casts a summoner spell, she gains 3 missiles that fire at the nearest target.

skill_e.tooltip: Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast near a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy Movement Speed.

skill_i.tooltip: Seeds spawn around Zyra periodically, becoming faster with level and lasting 30 seconds. If an enemy Champion steps on a seed, it dies. Zyra can cast spells near seeds to grow plants. Extra plants striking the same target deal reduced damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Thick vines spread through the ground and explode into spines, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area. If cast near a seed, Deadly Spines grows a Thorn Spitter plant, which fires at enemies from afar.

skill_r.tooltip: Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, dealing damage to enemies as it expands and knocking them airborne as it contracts.

skill_w.tooltip: Zyra plants a seed, lasting up to 60 seconds. Deadly Spines and Grasping Roots cast near seeds will turn them into plants who fight for Zyra. Additionally, Rampant Growth passively grants her plants improved maximum Health.
